title: Entrepreneurial Exits via Acquisitions
text:
In our Entrepreneurial Finance course, we had the great pleasure to welcome Mark Miller, founding partner at Carlsquare, one of the leading consultancies in Europe for mergers & acquisitions (M&A) of growth-oriented and innovative medium-sized companies. Mark gave an insightful overview into the M&A market in Europe, Carlsquare’s approach to support an acquisition process, and two exciting case studies, rounded up by a teaser of what a career as an M&A consultant could look lilke.
The students very much enjoyed the talk and were engaging actively with our guest. Thank you very much, Mark! See you next time.
END END2

title: Startup Engineer
section: Inaugurated in June 2014 · Headed by Christoph Ihl · Dedicated to three objectives: Research, Teaching, and Transfer
text:
Inaugurated in June 2014 · Headed by Christoph Ihl · Dedicated to three objectives: Research, Teaching, and Transfer
The Institute of Entrepreneurship (TIE) is a research institute at the Hamburg University of Technology (TUHH). It is part of the Faculty of Economics and Management and is located in the heart of Hamburg, Germany. The institute is dedicated to the promotion of entrepreneurship and innovation. It is a place for research, teaching, and practice. The institute is a member of the German Entrepreneurship Research Network (GERN) and the European Academy of Management (EURAM).
